titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Richard Thomas Kennedy papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Rebecca J. Mead

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2018-01-18T09:02-0800

change.item: January 2018: Added links to materials from the Records released in 2010 and Records released in 2017 series that are available on the digital collections website. -Sally DeBauche February, 2016: Revised to add offsite storage note October 2010: Declassified records series added by Lisa Miller; March 23, 2004: PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Richard Thomas Kennedy Papers)//EN" "kennedrt.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

physdesc.extent: 92 manuscript boxes, 2 envelopes, 17 phonotapes, 2 video tapes

did.abstract: Speeches, correspondence, memoranda, reports, transcripts of hearings, and printed matter relating to nuclear power plants in the U.S., and especially to the Three Mile Island nuclear accident. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p:
Collection is open for research. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org. Collection stored off site; a minimum of two days notice is required for use. Boxes may be requested through Stanford's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu
The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items, computer media, and digital files. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos, films, or digital files during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Richard Thomas Kennedy papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1983.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Planning and financial management adviser to Iran
International affairs adviser, Office of the Assistant Secretary of Defense
Senior member of the staff, National Security Council
Director, Staff Planning and Coordination, National Security Council
Deputy Assistant to the President for National Security Council planning

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Speeches, correspondence, memoranda, reports, transcripts of hearings, and printed matter relating to nuclear power plants in the United States, and especially to the Three Mile Island nuclear accident.

altformavail.head: Alternate Forms Available
altformavail.p: Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

controlaccess.subject: Nuclear energy--United States.
Nuclear energy.
controlaccess.geogname: Three Mile Island Nuclear Power Plant (Pa.)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, memoranda, calendars, telephone logs, extensive background materials for trips and speeches, and a few actual copies of speeches by Richard T. Kennedy. Arranged by form.

did.unittitle: DOMESTIC NUCLEAR REACTOR LICENSING AND REGULATION,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Memoranda, reports, speeches, letters and miscellany relating to licensing policy and procedure. Arranged by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Speeches, reports, bills, memoranda, letters, hearing transcripts and miscellany relating to non-proliferation issues and to the nuclear activities of various countries. Arranged by country.

did.unittitle: NUCLEAR REACTOR OPERATION, SAFETY AND RESEARCH,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Memoranda, reports, letters, speeches, hearing transcripts and operator examinations. Arranged by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Serial issues, telephone logs, reports, hearing transcripts, press releases, speeches, clippings, printed articles, memoranda and letters relating to the accident at Three Mile Island (TMI), Pennsylvania, 1979 March-April. Arranged by originating agency.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Memoranda, reports, hearing transcripts, speeches, press releases, telegrams, chronologies and letters. Arranged by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Speeches, memoranda, letters, hearing transcripts, reports and printed articles relating to the economics of nuclear power and alternative energy sources, as well as energy projections and policy issues. Arranged by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Reports, memoranda and transcripts relating to a variety of issues, arranged chronologically.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Formerly security-classified records of the U.S. government, released in full or in part. Available as PDF files. The PDF files are page images, so full-text search is not possible. Arranged chronologically by date of release by Hoover, thereunder by date of creation.

did.unittitle: General. Annual report, pamphlet, regulations and memoranda primarily relating to the Sunshine Act and the Ethics in Government Act,
Speeches. NOTE: The few copies of speeches by Richard Kennedy are found with related materials under the subsequent entry, "Trips"
General. Speeches by other NRC personnel, primarily Commissioners
Background materials. Materials for Commissioner Kennedy's speeches, arranged by subject
Telephone logs. Includes attachments of appointment schedules and note pads
Trips. Includes extensive briefing materials, and a few speeches (See Appendix for details)

odd.head: General note
odd.p: SEE ALSO: VIDEOCASSETTES for an interview and a presentation given by Commissioner Kennedy in Korea, 1978 March

did.unittitle: "Cleaning up Our Federal Energy Regulatory Mess," "Health and Safety Aspects of Nuclear Reactor Exports," Remarks,

odd.head: General note
odd.p: SEE ALSO: PHONOTAPES for cassette tapes which include a speech by Richard Kennedy at the American Law Institute-American Bar Association Second Annual Program on Nuclear Export Control, 1979 March; and a reel-to-reel tape of a speech delivered by Richard Kennedy in Madrid, 1979 Nov. 5

did.unittitle: DOMESTIC NUCLEAR REACTOR LICENSING AND REGULATION,
General. Speeches, letters and responses to Congressional inquiries,
Immediate Effectiveness Study. Relates to the issue of nuclear power plant construction during adjudication proceedings. Includes several reports

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes an annual report of the U.S. Arms Control and Disarmament Agency and a presidential report to Congress, 1980 Jan.

did.unittitle: International Conference on Regulating Nuclear Energy,
Atomic Industrial Forum Conference on Nuclear Non-proliferation and Safeguards,
Atomic Industrial Forum Executive Conference on International Nuclear Commerce,
Organization of American States Conference on the Utilization of Small and Medium Size Power Reactors in Latin America,
India. Relates to the export of fuel and components for the Tarapur reactor

Soviet Union. DOE "Report of the Visit of the U.S.-U.S.S.R. Coordinating Committee on Scientific and Technical Cooperation in the Field of Thermal Power Plant Heat Rejection Systems to the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics," (DOE/ET-0076)
West Germany. Relates to the proposed export of reactor components in the construction of a new reactor,
NUCLEAR REACTOR OPERATION, SAFETY AND RESEARCH,
Includes comments on an NRC/EPA Task Force report (NUREG-0396),
Includes materials relating to an organizational discussion,
General, Primarily printed reports (NUREG-0002, NUREG-0290 and NUREG-0095) relating to safeguards and material accounting.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: SEE ALSO: INTERNATIONAL REGULATION AND EXPORT LICENSING/General/Non-proliferation and weapons

did.unittitle: American Physical Society Study Group on Nuclear Fuel Cycles and Waste Management report,
Information and communications systems. Includes a report by the Mitre Corporation, "Communications and Control to Support Incident Management",
Inspection and enforcement. Primarily policy issues
Burden of proof in enforcement proceedings,
Emergency Core Cooling System (ECCS). Report of Advisory Task Force on Power Reactor Emergency Cooling,
General. Relates largely to the progress of the Risk Assessment Review Group
Lewis Study. Primarily reaction to and analysis of the Lewis Report

Radiation exposure (including occupational exposure), Includes reports by the National Research Council, "Considerations of Health Benefit-Cost Analysis for Activities Involving Ionizing Radiation Exposure and Alternatives," "Occupational Radiation Exposure at Light Water Cooled Power Reactors," (NUREG-0482), and Massachusetts PIRG, "Nuclear Power Plants: Unsafe for Workers,"
Clippings, Predominantly relating to the venting of krypton-85 from the TMI-2 reactor
General, Includes statements by President Jimmy Carter and others, relating to the accident and the subsequent Kemeny Commission investigation
Associated Press and United Press International,
General. Miscellaneous sheets to be interfiled with transcripts which are not in this collection

Electric Power Research Institute (EPRI), Nuclear Safety Analysis Center (NSAC), "Analysis of Three Mile Island Unit 2 Accident," Report with indexed bibliography and memoranda comparing this report to NUREG-0600
Energy Department (DOE). Letters and an aerial radiological report,
Illinois Commission on Atomic Energy. Report, letter, commission review material,
Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers, Inc. Serial issue and letters,
NRC Special Inquiry Group (Rogovin Commission). This was an independent study commissioned by the NRC and prepared under the direction of the law firm of Rogovin, Stern and Huge
General. Primarily progress reports and materials related to NRC review of the final report; includes responses to letters from Reps. Toby Moffett and Morris Udall
Pennsylvania, State of. Governor's Commission on Three Mile Island. Report, memorandum and letters,
President's Commission on the Accident (Kemeny Commission)
Denton, Harold (Director, NRC Office of Nuclear Reactor Regulation),
General. Background material, including annotated sequence of events and question lists
General. Background and NRC report review materials
Includes "NRC Views and Analysis of the Recommendations of the President's Commission on the Accident at Three Mile Island"
Final Report and Supplemental Views. Includes index to staff reports
Office of the General Counsel, "The Nuclear Regulatory Commission"
"Selection, Training, Qualification, and Licensing of Three Mile Island Reactor Operating Personnel"
"Containment: Transport of Radioactivity from the TMI-2 Core to the Environs"
Public Health and Safety Task Force
Public's Right to Information Task Force. Summary of report only
TMI Ad Hoc Nuclear Oversight Committee (Edison Electrical Institute, American Public Power Association, and National Rural Electric Cooperative Association), Report and letters,

General. Joint House-Senate hearings: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works, Subcommittee on Nuclear Regulation, Gary Hart, Chairman until 1981, followed by Alan K. Simpson (hereafter referred to as the Hart/Simpson Committee); and House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment, Morris Udall, Chairman (hereafter referred to as the Udall Committee), Transcript and NRC memorandum
Includes letter to Rep. Udall in response to inquiry,
House Committee on Armed Services, Subcommittee on Military Installations and Facilities, Lucien N. Nedzi, Chairman. Memorandum,

House Committee on Government Operations, Subcommittee on Energy and Natural Resources, Anthony Toby Moffett, Chairman. Includes a hearing summary, a letter from Rogovin, and a transcript of hearings relating to the Rogovin report,
House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment, (Udall Committee). Includes transcripts, memoranda, and Kennedy responses to questions
House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce, Subcommittee on Energy and Power, John Dingell, Chairman. Transcript, memoranda and notes,
House Committee on Science and Technology
Subcommittee on Energy Research and Production, Mike McCormack, Chairman. Memoranda and transcripts,
Subcommittee on Natural Resources and Environment, Jerome A. Ambro, Chairman. Memoranda,
Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works, Subcommittee on Nuclear Regulation (Hart/Simpson Committee).
General. Letters from the NRC in response to Committee inquiries,
Hearing transcript (morning session), statements, memoranda, and responses to questions
Hearing transcript, statements, and responses to questions

Senate Committee on Government Operations, Subcommittee on Energy, Nuclear Proliferation and Government Processes, John Glenn, Chairman. Memoranda, transcripts, statements, and responses to questions,
General. Pre-accident materials relating to the operating license, including an inspection report,
Correspondence. Incoming. Includes letters and telegrams neither to nor from the NRC
Memoranda. Includes material relating to technical issues and the release of NRC meeting transcripts,
"Evaluation of Long-term Post Accident Core Cooling of Three Mile Island Unit 2" (NUREG-0557)
Accident sequence. Chronologies, memoranda, hearing transcript and statement,
General. Includes letter and report to the Rogovin Commission relating to ACRS recommendations,
Babcock and Wilcox. Primarily post-TMI re-evaluation of generic design and sister plants
Davis Besse (Ohio), NOTE: A very similar accident occurred here yet was recognized and controlled

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Gov. Edmund Brown, Jr.

did.unittitle: C. Michelson, "Decay Heat Removal during a Very Small Breack LOCA for a B&W 205-Fuel-Assembly PWR"
"Staff Report on the Generic Assessment of Feedwater Transients in Pressurized Water Reactors Designed by the B&W Company" (NUREG-0560)
Corrective actions. Consists of TMI Lessons Learned Task Force recommendations and the subsequent development of an Action Plan for more general reactor regulation reform

Includes a report entitled "TMI Lessons Learned Task Force Status Report and Short-term Recommendations" (NUREG-0578), and a transcript sent to the NRC by the President's Commission for licensing review purposes,

Includes a memorandum with a transcript of a briefing by Harold Denton on the conclusions of the task force, a draft report entitled "Report to the Director, Office of Inspection and Enforcement on Lessons Learned from Three Mile Island by Special Review Group, OIE" (NUREG-0616), a final report entitled, "TMI-2 Lessons Learned Final Report", Oct.; a report entitled "Supplement to Staff Position on Need to Consider Class 9 Events," which relates to a general re-evaluation of major accident factors, including appendices on the NRC Action Plan, siting and design, emergency preparedness and radiation effects,
Decontamination and clean-up of the TMI-2 reactor
Includes materials relating to public meetings held in Pennsylvania,

Extraordinary Nuclear Occurrence (ENO). Relates to the discussion concerning application of this designation to the TMI accident, thus qualifying under the Price-Andersen Act to provide payment for any resulting claims
General Public Utilities/Metropolitan Edison. Relates primarily to issues of management competence and the restart of the undamaged TMI-1 reactor, Includes public meeting,
Includes an interim report submitted by Met. Ed. with cover memorandum and a Safety Evaluation order modifying operating license
did.unitdate: 1979 June-1980 Jan. dated Aug. 9; ca. Sept.

did.unittitle: General, Includes some material relating to allegations by Harold W. Hartman, Jr.
"Investigation into the March 28, 1979 Three Mile Island Accident by Office of Inspection and Enforcement" (NUREG-0600)
Legal issues. Relates largely to records management and FOIA requests,
Social and psychological effects, Includes a report entitled, "The Social and Economic Effects of the Accident at Three Mile Island" (NUREG/CR-1215)
Hydrogen bubble, Includes a report on hydrogen/oxygen generation rate during the accident,

odd.head: General note
odd.p: SEE ALSO: NUCLEAR REGULATORY COMMISSION OFFICE FILES/Speeches/Background materials

did.unittitle: General, Letters, memoranda, notes, reports on licensing problems, and a transcript of a meeting with the NRC
General, Memoranda, reports, and hearing testimony
Anti-trust review process. Memoranda, reports, and letters,
Energy policy and projections. Primarily speeches, reports and printed articles, Includes a survey report by Louis Harris & Associates, Inc.,
Solar studies. Letters relating to a proposed study,
1 phonotape (reel-to-reel) of a speech given in Madrid by Richard Kennedy,
16 cassettes of the American Law Institute-American Bar Association Second Annual Program on Nuclear Export Control, Washington, D.C.,
1 cassette of a song by Bea Godfney, "God Bless Solar Energy"
See photo card catalog for description

Two videocassettes made during a trip to Korea in 1978 March: an interview with Richard Kennedy entitled "Nuclear Energy and Nonproliferation", and a speech by Richard Kennedy entitled "United States Nonproliferation Policy"
General. Includes miscellaneous material relating to the restriction of these documents

Adjudicatory items relating to: 1) restricted data procedures; 2) certiorari system for the Commission; 3) use of cameras during NRC licensing hearings; 4) SECY-A-75-24; 5) reactor site criteria. Reports and memoranda
3) Returned to collection as per NRC Public Documents print-out
4) Expurgated copy returned to collection as per NRC letter
5) Original returned to collection as per NRC letter
Review of ALAB-268, Southern California Edison Co., San Onofre. Policy report
Clinch River Breeder Reactor (SECY A-76-45 and ALAB-330). Report prepared for Commissioner Kennedy by Richard Stratford
Signing of NRC/FMI arrangement for nuclear facilities safety cooperation. Summary telex (?) message relating to IAEA meeting in Vienna
Opinion on petition for intervention and hearing on Tarapur, India export license (SECY-A-76-40). Memorandum/report from Peter Strauss, General Counsel
Memorandum from Commissioner Kennedy to Ken Chapman relating to safeguards
Summary information on FBI conference re: Bicentennial weekend with letter from Director, Civil Aviation Security Service. Memorandum relating to possible terrorist activities
Commission review of NEPA issues presented by the Clinch River Breeder Reactor project. Memorandum/report from Peter L. Strauss, General Counsel
Export Reorganization Act (S. 1439): Next Steps. Memorandum from Ben Huberman for the Commission
Comments on the August 31 version of the Safeguards supplement. Memorandum from Commissioner Kennedy to Ben Huberman
Comments on the draft DES Safeguards Supplement Cost Benefit Analysis. Memorandum from Commissioner Kennedy to Ben Huberman
Export Licensing Review. Memorandum and draft report from James R. Shea to the Commission. Expurgated copy returned to collection as per NRC letter
Draft summary of Export Licensing Study. Memorandum and draft summary from James R. Shea to the Commission
Draft Export Licensing Study: Next Steps. Memorandum and outline of proposed export licensing rule from Ben Huberman to the Commission
"Nuclear Energy's Dilemma: Safely Disposing of High Level Radioactive Wastes". Partial draft GAO report previously attached to testimony by Clifford V. Smith before the Udall Committee

Additional guidance--Policy on Alternative Site Evaluations (SECY-77-433). Memorandum from Samuel J. Chilk (Secretary) to Lee V. Gossick (Executive Director for Operations) with attached policy statement. Expurgated copy returned to collection as per NRC letter of 1987 July 30
Report on discussions with foreign officials during trip to Far East, Report with cover memorandum from Joseph D. Lafleur, Jr. (Office of International Programs) to Commissioner Kennedy
NRC staff comments on proposed export of special nuclear materials to India for the Tarapur Atomic Power Station. Legal document
N. C. Menon report on NRC consideration of Tarapur fuel license. State Department dispatch
State Department response to questions on proposed export to India, XSNM-1379. Information report
Westinghouse FOIA request. Memorandum from Commissioner Kennedy for Carlton R. Stoiber (Assistant General Counsel) with attachments of earlier materials
Staff requirements--affirmation session 79-29. Memorandum with attachments from Samuel Chilk to Lee V. Gossick and Leonard Bickwit, Jr. (General Counsel)
Staff organization. Memorandum from Commissioner Kennedy to the Commission

Draft GAO letter report to Senators Hart and Simpson on NRC's actions to implement TMI recommendations. Memorandum from James J. Cummings (Director, Office of Inspector and Auditor) to William J. Dircks (Executive Director for Operations). Original returned to collection as per NRC letter
(with memorandum). Partial expurgated copy returned to the collection as per NRC letter
(with memorandum). Partial expurgated copy returned to the collection as per NRC letter
